## label

show label

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = list(label=list()))
```
label text style

```{r}
cfg = list(
  label = list(
    rotate=45,
    style = list(
      fill='#fc9845',
      fontSize = 18
    )
  )
)

mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = cfg)
```

label formatter
```{r}
cfg = list(
  label = list(
    formatter = htmlwidgets::JS('(v) => `[${v.mpg}, ${v.disp}]`')
  )
)
mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = cfg)
```
